description: MCP server for comprehensive Rust crate documentation analysis
pre_install: if ($LASTEXITCODE -ne 0) { throw 'Failed to install Rust nightly toolchain' }
notes: rust-docs-mcp is an MCP server for Rust documentation analysis.
To use with Claude Code, add it as an MCP server:
claude mcp add rust-docs -s user $env:SCOOP\shims\rust-docs-mcp.exe -t stdio
Note: If $env:SCOOP is not set, the default is usually:
claude mcp add rust-docs -s user $env:USERPROFILE\scoop\shims\rust-docs-mcp.exe -t stdio
